official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States with respect to corduroy and velveteen.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to specify that one basis for the tariff on pile fabrics is the use of the pile threads rather than the use of the pile in the fabrics' construction. Imposes the current tariff on pile corduroy and velveteen fabrics whether or not the filling floats are cut.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States with respect to corduroy and velveteen.
